column11: 36 official languages, som of which have very few speakers (e.g. Buare has 40, Leco 20, Itonama has 5, Cayubaba has 4, Guarasu'we is listed as extinct, Machajuyai-Kallawaya has no L1 speakers only 20 L2s, Puquina is an extinct Aztec language, there were 200 speakers of Toromon in 1985 but none located since)
